channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: ‘OOPS’ tag graffiti on wall next to park, 26th June
item.description:
Graffiti on corner wall opposite Alexandra Park

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westbourne Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned untaxed van, 26th June
item.description:
This van has been abandoned for over two months in Oakmere Road by number 19. Its road tax expired on 23rd April 2025. 'The Local Authority can take Enforcement action on a vehicle parked on a public road if its tax has expired for more than 2 calendar months and 1 day' so we expect swift Enforcement action. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakmere Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trampoline missing springs, 26th June
item.description:

item.title: Uneven flooring by tree, 26th June
item.description:
The tarmac flooring around the big tree is uneven and a tripping hazard. Has been for months maybe even years. I had a fall here yesterday (25/06/2025) resulting in a hospital visit, a badly sprained ankle and fractured elbow. Photos and hospital report can be provided.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark Park Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black BMW car parked and abandoned in disabled bay 3 months, 26th June
item.description:

item.title: Overflowing abandoned rubbish skip, 26th June
item.description:
Another overflowing abandoned rubbish skip, which is attracting more rubbish and is incredibly unsightly. This keeps happening because there is no enforcement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Berners Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car on Byron Close, 26th June
item.description:
Abandoned silver Mini One on Byron Close. Apparently the car has been declared SORN and has no MOT. The front passenger side tyre is flat. Not sure how long it has been there but at least a fortnight.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Byron Close, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
